Package Distributed.Messages.serverMessages

Interface ServerMessage

All Superinterfaces:
NetworkMessage, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatMessage, GameEndedMessage, GameResumedMessage, JoinRequestAcceptedMessage, JoinRequestRefusedMessage, LeaveLobbyMessage, ModelViewMessage, ModelViewUpdateMessage, PingClientMessage, RankingMessage, RoomSizeSettedMessage, ServerMessageAbs, SetRoomSizeMessage, ShelfUpdateMessage, TestMessage, TurnUpdateMessage, WithdrawUpdateMessage
public interface ServerMessage extends NetworkMessage
Interface for a message sent from the server

  • Method Details

    • isBroadcast

      boolean isBroadcast()
      Checks if a message is for all clients or for a particular one
      Returns:
      true if the message is for everyone, false otherwise

    • getReceiver

      List<String> getReceiver()
      Returns:
      the list of the names of the player who is going to receive the message

    • execute

      void execute(Client client)
      Executes the message on the client
      Parameters:
      client - is the Client used to execute the message

    • execute

      void execute(View view)
      Executes the message on the view
      Parameters:
      view - is the View used to execute the message
